text: Na o na mbere ya maguta gũcinwo-rĩ, ndungata ya mũthĩnjĩri-Ngai nĩyokaga na ĩkeera mũndũ ũrĩa ũraruta igongona atĩrĩ, “He mũthĩnjĩri-Ngai nyama imwe ahĩĩhie; ndegwĩtĩkĩra nyama nduge kuuma kũrĩ we, tiga o nyama njĩthĩ.”2:15 Kũringana na watho, maguta hamwe na nyama cia maguta ciacinagĩrwo igũrũ wa kĩgongona (Alaw 3:16; 4:8-10).
